NAME: Disarm
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical damage to an enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Shadow Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical dark damage to an enemy. Does not skip your turn but lowers your defense.

NAME: Sharpen Knives
DESCRIPTION: Sharpen your knives, raising your attack, critical hit chance and critical damage.

NAME: Hurricane Blades
DESCRIPTION: Deal great physical wind damage to an enemy
